items.sentence: Everyone in the class made fun of Tom\'s new haircut.
Tom regretted having wasted a great deal of his life.
I never realized you were such a good French speaker.
I now know more about Tom than I really want to know.
Let\'s give up on our plan to eat at that restaurant.
It\'s worth much more than what Tom is asking for it.
There\'s nothing you can say that\'ll change my mind.
I met Tom just the other day in front of the station.
The traffic jam caused me to be late for the meeting.
Tom saw both Mary and John getting out of their cars.
